name: Classic Shoyu Ramen
description: Traditional Japanese ramen with soy sauce-based broth, topped with sliced pork, bamboo shoots, and green onions.

name: Spicy Miso Ramen
description: Ramen with rich miso-flavored broth, infused with spicy chili oil and garnished with ground pork, corn, and bean sprouts.

name: Tonkotsu Black Ramen
description: Indulge in this creamy and rich pork bone broth ramen, complemented by black garlic oil, soft-boiled egg, and wood ear mushrooms.

name: Vegetarian Shio Ramen
description: A light and flavorful ramen featuring clear salt-based broth, with a variety of fresh vegetables such as spinach, cabbage, and carrots.

name: Chicken Paitan Ramen
description: Enjoy this hearty and satisfying chicken-based ramen with a creamy white broth, served with tender chicken slices, narutomaki, and nori.

name: Seafood Shoyu Ramen
description: Delight your taste buds with this ocean-inspired ramen featuring a savory soy sauce broth, packed with assorted seafood such as shrimp, clams, and squid.

name: Sesame Tan Tan Ramen
description: Experience the bold flavors of this spicy sesame-infused ramen, topped with ground pork, bok choy, and a sprinkle of toasted sesame seeds.

name: Kimchi Ramen
description: Savor the tangy and spicy flavors of kimchi in this unique ramen dish, featuring a hearty broth with kimchi, pork belly, and scallions.

name: Curry Laksa Ramen
description: Embark on a culinary journey with this Malaysian-inspired curry laksa ramen, boasting a fragrant coconut curry broth, shrimp, tofu puffs, and rice noodles.

name: Vegan Ramen Bowl
description: A plant-based delight featuring a rich and flavorful vegetable broth, accompanied by tofu, shiitake mushrooms, and baby bok choy.

name: Pork Bao
description: Delicious bao filled with slow-cooked pork and oriental spices.

name: Vegetarian Bao
description: Vegetarian bao filled with shiitake mushrooms, carrots, and caramelized onions.

name: Teriyaki Chicken Bao
description: Bao with succulent teriyaki chicken, onion, and sweet sauce.

name: Beef Bao
description: Bao with marinated beef steamed with crunchy vegetables.

name: Fish Bao
description: Bao with delicious fresh fish, cabbage salad, and lime sauce.

name: Shrimp Bao
description: Bao with fresh shrimp, pickled cucumbers, and spicy sauce.

name: Tofu Bao
description: Bao with crispy tofu, mixed vegetables, and sweet and sour sauce.

name: Bacon Bao
description: Bao with smoked bacon, hard-boiled eggs, and marinated red onion.

name: Curry Bao
description: Bao with curry chicken, roasted peppers, and red onion.

name: Salmon Bao
description: Bao with fresh salmon, avocado, and sesame sauce.

name: Green Tea Mochi
description: Traditional Japanese mochi with green tea filling.

name: Sesame Mochi
description: Rice flour-wrapped mochi with sesame paste filling.

name: Azuki Bean Mochi
description: Classic mochi with sweet red bean paste filling.

name: Coconut Mochi
description: Soft mochi with creamy coconut flavor filling.

name: Mango Mochi
description: Sweet mochi with fresh mango pulp filling.

name: Strawberry Mochi
description: Rice flour-wrapped mochi with strawberry cream filling.

name: Pistachio Mochi
description: Mochi with creamy pistachio flavored filling.

name: Chocolate Mochi
description: Rice flour-wrapped mochi with dark chocolate cream filling.

name: Salted Caramel Mochi
description: Mochi with creamy salted caramel filling.

name: Lemon Mochi
description: Rice flour-wrapped mochi with lemon cream filling.

name: Pear and Honey Iced Tea
description: Cold green tea with fresh pear juice and natural sweetness of honey.

name: Zhujiang Beer
description: A Chinese lager beer with a perfect balance of sweetness and bitterness.

name: Lotus Flower Iced Tea
description: Cold green tea flavored with lotus flower for a floral and refreshing taste.

name: Pearl River Beer
description: A light and refreshing beer, produced in Guangdong Province, China.

name: Strawberry and Basil Iced Tea
description: Cold green tea with fresh strawberry pulp and basil leaves for a touch of freshness.

name: Red Star Beer
description: Dark and robust beer, with a malty and slightly caramelized flavor.

name: Melon and Mint Flavored Water
description: Fresh water with melon cubes and mint leaves for a refreshing and fragrant drink.

name: Blackcurrant and Lemon Iced Tea
description: Cold green tea with blackcurrant juice and a splash of lemon for a fruity and citrusy flavor.

name: Lao Shan Beer
description: Craft Chinese beer, made with pure spring water from the mountains of Lao Shan.

name: Lemon and Ginger Iced Tea
description: Cold green tea with fresh lemon juice and a spicy note of ginger.
